sourceMeaningMnemonic: This <radical>net</radical> needs to be <radical>fix</radical>ed if you want to <kanji>put</kanji> food on the table.
meaningInfo: You can't put something in your net if it's broken. Fix it!
readingMnemonic: Once it's fixed, you <kanji>put</kanji> a bunch of <reading>chee</reading>se (<ja>ち</ja>) in the net. You want to catch something that eats cheese, so that you can then put that animal on your dinner table.
readingInfo: Imagine putting a bunch of cheese in your now-fixed net. It kinda stinks!
